app.title: Subtitle Flow
app.description: Synchronize and edit subtitles for your media files.
footer.copyright: © 2025 Subtitle Flow. Idea from Amin Sharifi, code developed with help of Firebase Studio. <0>Original concept</0>. Powered by Next.js, OpenAI (using Whisper), AvalAI & Groq.
footer.features.title: Key Features
footer.features.description: Subtitle Flow is a powerful, browser-based subtitle editor. Key features include: multi-format support (SRT, VTT), an intuitive timeline editor, real-time media player synchronization, and AI-powered tools like automatic transcription (OpenAI Whisper, Groq, AvalAI) in over 60 languages. Enjoy complete privacy as all processing happens locally. Bring your own API key for AI features. It's fast, works offline for core editing, and is free to use.

cheatsheet.title: Keyboard Cheatsheet & Tips
cheatsheet.description: Quick guide for using Subtitle Flow with your keyboard and other helpful tips.
cheatsheet.generalNav.title: General Navigation
cheatsheet.generalNav.tab: <0>Tab</0>: Move to the next interactive element.
cheatsheet.generalNav.shiftTab: <0>Shift</0> + <1>Tab</1>: Move to the previous interactive element.
cheatsheet.generalNav.enterSpace: <0>Enter</0> / <1>Space</1>: Activate focused buttons or select items in a dropdown.
cheatsheet.uploadStep.title: Upload Step (Step 1)
cheatsheet.uploadStep.openDialog: Focus the "Media File" or "Subtitle File" input, then press <0>Enter</0> or <1>Space</1> to open the file selection dialog.
cheatsheet.uploadStep.activateButtons: Tab to "Generate Full Subtitles with AI" or "Proceed to Edit" buttons and press <0>Enter</0>.
cheatsheet.editStep.title: Edit Step (Step 2)
cheatsheet.editStep.mediaPlayer.title: Media Player:
cheatsheet.editStep.mediaPlayer.controls: Tab to player controls (Play/Pause, Rewind, Fast Forward, Volume, Subtitle Timing Shift). Activate with <0>Enter</0> or <1>Space</1>.
cheatsheet.editStep.mediaPlayer.sliders: Use <0>Arrow Keys</0> (Left/Right) when focus is on the progress or volume sliders.
cheatsheet.editStep.trackLang.title: Track & Language Selection:
cheatsheet.editStep.trackLang.openDropdo: Tab to the "Active Subtitle Track" or "Transcription Language" select boxes.
cheatsheet.editStep.trackLang.activateDr: Press <0>Enter</0> or <1>Space</1> to open the dropdown.
cheatsheet.editStep.editor.title: Subtitle Editor:
cheatsheet.editStep.editor.addNew: Tab to "Add New" button and press <0>Enter</0>.
cheatsheet.editStep.editor.tabThrough: Tab through each subtitle entry's Start Time, End Time, Text Area, Regenerate Button, and Delete Button.
cheatsheet.editStep.editor.typeText: Type in the Text Area. <0>Enter</0> creates a new line.
cheatsheet.exportStep.title: Export Step (Step 3)
cheatsheet.exportStep.buttons: Tab to "Export as .SRT", "Export as .VTT", "Edit More", or "Start Over" buttons.
cheatsheet.tips.title: Tips
cheatsheet.tips.apiKey: Ensure your API key (OpenAI, AvalAI, or Groq) is set in Settings for AI features.
cheatsheet.tips.fullTranscriptionLang: For full AI transcription, the language selected in the 'Generate with AI' section on the Upload page will be used (defaults to your setting).
cheatsheet.tips.segmentRegenLang: For segment regeneration in the editor, the language selected in the editor's dropdown is used.
cheatsheet.tips.debugLogs: Check the Debug Logs (scroll icon) for detailed process information.
debugLog.title: Debug Logs
debugLog.description: Recent application activity and diagnostic messages. Newest logs are shown first.
